title: Excessive Flashing in Control Example
description: The issue involves excessive flashing when resizing the window vertically in the Control Example.
OB: When resizing the window vertically in the Control Example, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash continuously.
EB: When resizing the window vertically in the Control Example, the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should resize smoothly without any flashing or flickering.
SR:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Resize the window vertically.
3. Observe the flashing of all tabs in the TabFolder and Frames.
